content: अनार्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not belonging to the Ṛṣis, not Vedic; not belonging to the text of a Vedic hymn (as इति used in the Padapāṭha with certain words not followed in the Saṃhitā by इति); संबुद्धौ शाकल्यस्येतौ अनार्षे <ls>P. I. 1. 16</ls> (= अवैदिके <ls>Sk.</ls>). {@--2@} Not added to a Ṛṣi's name (as an affix); <ls>P. IV. 1. 78.</ls>
